name: Intelligent Growth Solutions (IGS)
description:
IGS is a multi-award-winning international agritech innovator delivering vertical farming solutions to customers across the world. 

Our approach and technological design are based upon a culture of continuous innovation, a refusal to accept conventional thinking and brilliant, simple design.  

We blend our engineering, crop science and agronomy skills to build the best technology to allow our customers to succeed.  Importantly, we are not commercial growers.  Our success is driven by enabling our customers to grow tasty, nutritious, additive-free produce for the consumer using economically viable and environmentally sustainable methods. Our Growth Towers come in 6m, 9m and 12m variants and can grow a wide variety of crops including microgreens, herbs, salad leaves, brassicas, roots, fruits and botanicals (including edible flowers).
